name: arch::boot::linux_boot::parse_kernel_commandline

mm::kspace::paddr_to_vaddr.doc: Convert physical address to virtual address using offset, only available inside `ostd`

core::ffi::CStr::to_str.doc: Yields a &[str] slice if the `CStr` contains valid UTF-8. If the contents of the `CStr` are valid UTF-8 data, this function will return the corresponding &[str] slice. Otherwise, it will return an error with details of where UTF-8 validation failed. [str]: prim@str "str" # Examples ``` assert_eq!(c"foo".to_str(), Ok("foo")); ```
